name: actors_list_born_today
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool online_movie_database.
Tool description: This API helps to query for all information about films, actors, characters,etc... to create a movie/series/streaming content site/application
API description: Fetches a list of actors and actresses born on a specific day and month from the Online Movie Database via the RapidAPI platform.

month.description: The month of birth of the actors.

day.description: The day of birth of the actors.
